description: A workflow that manages birthdays and sends reminders
name: Hazel the Birthday Bot
long_description: Hazel is an intelligent birthday management bot powered by Gemini AI that helps you celebrate special moments! I can store birthdays, generate personalized AI-powered birthday wishes, send automatic reminders, and manage your birthday calendar. Whether you want to remember someone's special day, create a heartfelt birthday message, or get notified about upcoming celebrations, I'm here to make every birthday memorable. Simply ask me to 'generate a birthday wish', 'remember a birthday', or 'list upcoming birthdays' and I'll take care of the rest!
short_description: AI-powered birthday bot that stores dates, generates personalized wishes, and sends smart reminders for celebrations.
